Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data

Class JavaSerializedDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data.JavaSerializedDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database
public class JavaSerializedDatabase extends Object implements Database
Implementation of the Database interface using Java serialization for data storage.
